name: The Neo Qin
description:
In 2071, Shangai i developed way beyond what Men could control. The city has gone mad, and the rule to live by is every man for himself. The government is trying to control everything and everyone. Yin comes from a humble and poor village, unbeknown to all of the technology surrounding it. When the resources became too limited to live by, she decided to leave her people behind to search for help in the city. Not knowing what she'll discover, she only founds a hostile place : she'll need to use her famous quin, symbol of her village, to fight for her life.

Theme : Science-Fiction

2D, profile view. Arcade style. Neo-China. Opposition between traditional and modern.
